{"id":663149816,"question_id":2311,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 7 months","timestamp":1647710513,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1184 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/663149816/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum White Tiles After Covering With Carpets","memory":"25.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int dp[1005][1005];\n    \n    int solve(int i,string &s , int ase , int len)\n    {\n        if(i >= s.size()) return 0;\n    \n        if(dp[i][ase] != -1) return dp[i][ase];\n    \n        int d = INT_MAX ;\n        if(s[i]=='0') \n            d =  min(d , solve(i+1, s, ase, len) ) ;\n        else\n        {\n            d = min(d , 1 + solve(i+1 , s , ase , len) );\n            if(ase > 0)\n            d =  min(d , solve(i+len, s, ase-1, len) ) ;\n        }\n    \n        return dp[i][ase] = d;\n    \n    }\n    \n    \n    int minimumWhiteTiles(string floor, int numCarpets, int carpetLen)\n    {\n        memset(dp , -1 , sizeof(dp));\n        return solve(0,floor,numCarpets,carpetLen);\n    }\n    \n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-white-tiles-after-covering-with-carpets","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
